card.name: CW - Report For the year to date, Per day, A Count of all verified judgments

data.text:
hi @gillianoberholzer 

this is not an quick/easy report. The request to return all data from a Court Works server and match it to CIPC data residing on a different server is tricky. This is a resource intensive report to generate as i might have to setup a link server which will run forever. I might have to do the report manually on 2 different servers.
